item.title: Adway Kulkarni
item.description: Adway Kulkarni is a key figure in Meducationxâ€™s framework. Although he specializes in research, Adway is seen to help out around all fields that Meducationx covers, including design, blog writing, executive decision making, and much more.

item.title: Hasini Rachapudi
item.description: Interests and Hobbies: Neurology, Psychology, Bollywood dancing, Hip-hop dancing, Carnatic singing, writing poetry. Aiming for medical field (hopefully neuropsychiatry).

item.title: Navya Hariprakash
item.description: I am a creative and academically inclined person. Holding a youth membership, I have also received UNESCO certifications in classical dance.

item.title: Neelesh Chevuri
item.description: Introducing Neelesh Chevuri, our dedicated CTO at MeducationX. Neelesh is the tech-savvy mind behind our mission to make medical knowledge more accessible and engaging.

item.title: Owee Padalikar
item.description: I am always up for a challenge and love to learn new things. Along with my desire to become a surgeon in the future, I love researching about various science related topics.

item.title: Sahad Viliani
item.description: As the Founder and President of MeducationX, Sahad embarked on this journey driven by a profound curiosity about the medical field.

item.title: Wafiyah Wadud
item.description: Aspiring Psychologist Likes/Hobbies: Chemistry, Painting, Calligraphy, Learning Languages, Cooking, Working Out
